transaction

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • transaction.Account
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Checking, MoneyMarket, Saving

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class Account extends it's methods to Checking, Saving, and Money Market Class. Account class is the root of the account types and has its own constructor to create an account using a Profile, balance, and Date of opening. Account class modifies the balance of any account object. Provides the subclasses abstract methods for equals, monthlyInterest, and monthlyFee
    Author:
    Kacper Murdzek, Taranvir Singh

      Account(Profile holder, double balance, Date dateOpen)
      Account constructor has capabilities of creating an account object, and extends its constructor class to Checking, Saving, and Money Market class.
